name: Ball Unblock - Slide the blocks and roll the ball
name_original: Ball Unblock - Slide the blocks and roll the ball
description:
Ball Unblock is a simple and addictive unblock puzzle game. Move the blocks with your finger to create a path for moving the ball to the GOAL block. But metallic blocks can't be moved. Start solving puzzles now!
Features:
• Enjoy Sliding Puzzles, Just move and move
• Slide the blocks and escape the maze in this Maze Puzzle Game
• This is a Physics Puzzler, Physics-based gaming
• Test yourself and your Brain Teasers. Exercise your brain with this brain games
• Lots of funny levels and from easy to very difficult levels
• Enjoy the game with your family because this is a Family Puzzle Games
• You have to Match-3 Puzzle, Easy to learn but hard to master
• Remember the Retro Games of the past and Revisit the classics
